about_the_game:
Solaria is a minimalist take on the classic city builder genre without all of the stress and micro-management. Guide your city's growth to balance the needs of your citizens, and watch your unique narrative unfold.

Relaxing gameplay

No time constraints, and no wrong answers. Expand your city one hex tile at a time and simply enjoy the results.

Vibrant city life

The complex underlying simulation guides citizen behaviour to keep your city active and bustling, even at night!

Features

  • Construct & zone one hex tile at a time - the city will take it from there
  • Unlock new tiles & buildings by meeting the needs of your citizens
  • Full day / night cycle - watch your city...and your citizens...change entirely at night
  • Building upgrades - from modern-day solarpunk settlement to futuristic metropolis
  • City narrative unique to each play through
  • Plenty of time to enjoy watching your citizens in their interactions
  • Happy vibes!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB of video memory, OpenGL 3.3
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

short_description: Guide your city from fledgling solarpunk community to futuristic metropolis, one tile at a time. Watch your citizens survive and thrive. Solaria is a minimalist, solarpunk city builder where the city builds itself!
